name: Slappy Face: the Slappening
description:
Slappy Face: the Slappening is a fun, fast-paced, casual game for all ages!

Swipe to move the hand and slap the faces. Each slap gets you more time and more points. Get hat tricks and streaks to maximize your score! Six different types of boosts will assist you in your slapping.

But please, don’t slap the kittens. They’re so cute! What have they ever done to you? :’(

What are you waiting for? Get to slapping!

Do it! Do it now!

Why are you still reading this? Download the game now and slap away!
